description:
Part A: Chio-chan is busy gaming into the middle of the night again.
Part B: Manana gets curious about whether she has body odor after watching a news program on TV, so she has Chio-chan smell her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chio in the Middle of the Night / Apocri!
Chio mitten in der Nacht / Apokryphen
真夜中のちおちゃん / あぽくり!
